mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TOUR WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT ROWNUM , T.TOUR_NO , H.HOUSE_NO , R.ROOM_NO , R.ROOM_NAME , H.HOUSE_NAME , T.USER_NAME , T.ASK_CONTENT , T.TOUR_TIME , H.ADDRESS , T.STATUS , M.PHONE OWNER_PHONE FROM TOUR T JOIN ROOM R ON(R.ROOM_NO = T.ROOM_NO) JOIN HOUSE H ON(R.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(H.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE T.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT ROWNUM , T.TOUR_NO , H.HOUSE_NO , R.ROOM_NO , R.ROOM_NAME , H.HOUSE_NAME , T.USER_NAME , DECODE(T.GENDER, 'M', '남', 'W', '여') GENDER , T.AGE , T.PHONE , T.EMAIL , T.ASK_CONTENT , T.TOUR_TIME , T.STATUS , T.USER_NO FROM TOUR T JOIN ROOM R ON(R.ROOM_NO = T.ROOM_NO) JOIN HOUSE H ON(R.HOUSE_NO = H.HOUSE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(H.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND M.USER_TYPE = 'O' ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
